text: Vaani Kapoor (; , ; born 23 August 1988) is an Indian actress. She is known for her work in Bollywood movies produced by Yash Raj Films. Her first movie role was in the romantic comedy Shuddh Desi Romance (2013). She also starred in Aaha Kalyanam (2014) and Befikre (2016), but people criticised her performance, and because of that, she did not act for three years. Since then, she has played small roles in movies like War (2019). But in Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui (2021), in which she starred as a transgender woman, people praised her performance. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors
title: Vaani Kapoor
